# P1-T2: KPI Baseline Lock
**Date:** 2026-02-21
**Source:** `docs/plans/cyberlords.io_SEOAnalysisSummary_2_20_2026.csv` (crawl run 2026-02-20)
**Status:** LOCKED — do not edit. All future deltas measured against these numbers.

---

## Locked Baseline KPIs

| KPI | Baseline Count | Severity | Tracker Phase |
|---|---|---|---|
| Pages with duplicate meta descriptions | **67** | Moderate | P3-T3 |
| Pages with duplicate titles | **50** | Moderate | P3-T2 |
| Pages with insufficient content (thin) | **35** | Moderate | P4-T2 |
| Pages with short meta descriptions | **31** | Moderate | P3-T1 |
| Pages missing `<h1>` tag | **13** | High | P4-T1 |

---

## Target Thresholds (Phase 6 Success Criteria)

| KPI | Baseline | Target | Reduction |
|---|---|---|---|
| Duplicate meta descriptions | 67 | ≤ 5 | ~93% |
| Duplicate titles | 50 | ≤ 5 | ~90% |
| Thin pages | 35 | ≤ 10 | ~71% |
| Short meta descriptions | 31 | 0 (indexable pages) | 100% |
| Missing H1 | 13 | 0 | 100% |

---

## Notes

- Baseline SEO audit conducted on 2026-02-20 (data sourced from CSV export in `docs/plans/`).
- Counts reflect the live site at that point in time.
- Code-level root causes documented in `docs/plans/2026-02-21-baseline-crawl-snapshot.md`.
- Re-audit (P6-T1) must use the same tool and methodology to ensure valid delta comparison.
